name: John Lemon Haunted Jaunt
description:
This is the first game I made in unity which I did follow a tutorial but it is the first thing i created so ya I just wanted to share it.

the key of the game

so your in a haunted house that you have to escape, you have to find the spot where you escape somewhere in the haunted house once you get to  the place you automatically win the game, and be carefull of all ghosts and Gargoyles, if you walk in front of a ghost or gargoyle you die and the game restarts.
